chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
b: R
a: R
n: nat

Goal:
a <= b -> sorted Rle (unif_part a b n)

Premises:
Rle = fun r1 r2 : R => r1 < r2 \/ r1 = r2 : R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
unif_part = fun (a b : R) (n : nat) => mkseq (fun i : nat => a + INR i * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) (S (S n)) : R -> R -> nat -> seq R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
sorted = fix sorted (T : Type) (Ord : T -> T -> Prop) (s : seq T) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | [::] => True | [:: h0] => True | h0 :: (h1 :: _) as t0 => Ord h0 h1 /\ sorted T Ord t0 end : forall T : Type, (T -> T -> Prop) -> seq T -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope seq_scope]
unif_part_bound : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), unif_part a b n = rev (unif_part b a n)
Rminus_le_0 : forall a b : R, a <= b < -> 0 <= b - a
StepFun_P37 : forall (a b : R) (f g : StepFun a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RiemannInt_SF f <= RiemannInt_SF g
RiemannInt_SF : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R
fe : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R -> R
mkStepFun : forall (a b : R) (fe : R -> R), IsStepFun fe a b -> StepFun a b
RiemannInt_P2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (vn wn : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> a <= b -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - vn n t) <= wn n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (wn n)) < un n) -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (vn N)) l}
Rabs_triang : forall a b : R, Rabs (a + b) <= Rabs a + Rabs b
StepFun_P34 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), a <= b -> Rabs (RiemannInt_SF f) <= RiemannInt_SF {| fe := fun x : R => Rabs (f x); pre := StepFun_P32 f |}
StepFun_P32 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), IsStepFun (fun x : R => Rabs (f x)) a b
is_true = fun b : bool => b = true : bool -> Prop Argument scope is [bool_scope] is_true is a coercion
StepFun_P28 : forall (a b l : R) (f g : StepFun a b), IsStepFun (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b
sorted_cat : forall (Ord : ?T -> ?T -> Prop) (s1 s2 : seq ?T) (x0 : ?T), sorted Ord s1 -> sorted Ord s2 -> Ord (last x0 s1) (head x0 s2) -> sorted Ord (s1 ++ s2) where ?T : [a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
Record StepFun (a b : R) : Type := mkStepFun { fe : R -> R; pre : IsStepFun fe a b } For mkStepFun: Arguments a, b, fe are implicit For StepFun: Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope] For mkStepFun: Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope _]
sumbool_ind : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
BinNatDef.N.to_nat = fun a : N => match a with | 0%N => 0%nat | N.pos p => Pos.to_nat p end : N -> nat Argument scope is [N_scope]
ptd_sort' : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> sorted Rle (SF_ly ptd)
ptd_f2 : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (s : seq R), sorted Rle s -> (forall x y : R, x <= y -> x <= f x y <= y) -> pointed_subdiv (SF_seq_f2 f s)
SF_sorted_f1 : forall (f1 : R -> ?T) (P : seq R) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop), sorted Ord P < -> SF_sorted Ord (SF_seq_f1 f1 P) where ?T : [a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_sorted_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop), sorted Ord P < -> SF_sorted Ord (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) where ?T : [a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
sorted_incr : forall (s : seq R) (i j : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i <= j)%nat -> (j < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, nth x0 s i <= nth x0 s j
sorted_last : forall (s : seq R) (i : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, nth x0 s i <= last x0 s
sorted_head : forall (s : seq R) (i : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, head x0 s <= nth x0 s i
BinIntDef.Z.quotrem = fun a b : Z => match a with | 0%Z => (0%Z, 0%Z) | Z.pos a0 => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in (BinIntDef.Z.of_N q, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) | Z.neg b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in ((- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q)%Z, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) end | Z.neg a0 => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in ((- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q)%Z, (- BinIntDef.Z.of_N...
sorted_dec : forall (s : seq R) (x0 x : R), sorted Rle s -> head x0 s <= x <= last x0 s -> {i : nat | nth x0 s i <= x < nth x0 s (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size s)%nat} + {nth x0 s (size s - 2) <= x <= nth x0 s (size s - 1)}
sorted_compat : forall s : seq R, sorted Rle s < -> ordered_Rlist (seq2Rlist s)
pos_Rl = fix pos_Rl (l : Rlist) (i : nat) {struct l} : R := match l with | nil => 0 | cons a l' => match i with | 0%nat => a | S i' => pos_Rl l' i' end end : Rlist -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope]
SF_fun_incr : forall (s : SF_seq) (y0 : ?T) (x : R) (Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s)) (Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s)), SF_fun s y0 x = match sorted_dec (SF_lx s) 0 x Hs Hx with | inleft H => nth y0 (SF_ly s) (proj1_sig H) | inright _ => nth y0 (SF_ly s) (SF_size s - 1) end where ?T : [a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
sorted_nth : forall (Ord : ?T -> ?T -> Prop) (s : seq ?T), sorted Ord s < -> (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (size s))%nat -> forall x0 : ?T, Ord (nth x0 s i) (nth x0 s (S i))) where ?T : [a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
StepFun_P30 : forall (a b l : R) (f g : StepFun a b), RiemannInt_SF {| fe := fun x : R => f x + l * g x; pre := StepFun_P28 l f g |} = RiemannInt_SF f + l * RiemannInt_SF g
